contents: Article 4 (Business) The Committee carries out the following projects to achieve the purpose of Article 3. Revised May 15, 2017. 1. As the representative university sports organization in Korea, it is affiliated with FISU and the Asian University Sports Federation (AUSF) and represents Korea in its business. 2. Appointment of Korean representatives to FISU and AUSF with the approval of the Athletics Council 3. Matters of selection and dispatch of Korean national team athletes to the Summer and Winter World University Games 4. International university students in each event or other events managed by FISU and AUSF Matters related to competitions and daily sports 5. Matters related to the dissemination and promotion of World University Games activities in Korea 6. Matters related to the management of the World University Games emblem, lyrics, and music 7. Matters related to sports cultural exchanges among international university students 8. Matters related to holding a forum for the development of domestic and international university sports 9. Other matters necessary to achieve the purpose of the committee
